      • copyDir

        public static void copyDir(java.io.File src,
                           java.io.File dst)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Copies a directory.

        Steps:

        1. read all files from source (recursive)
        2. Clone this dirctorystructure to destination
        3. Copy files
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
